content: Glad to hear you enjoyed it! "San Junipero" is widely regarded as one of the best episodes of Black Mirror and is known for its emotional impact and heartfelt storytelling. The episode has gained a loyal fan base and has even inspired some to create real-life replicas of the San Junipero beach and arcade. Each episode of Black Mirror is unique and offers different perspectives on the intersection of humanity and technology. Which other episode is your favorite?
